casebody.data:
IN RE: Robert B. EVANS III NO. 2018-B-1433 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Petition for Interim Suspension for Threat of Harm filed by the Office of Disciplinary Counsel, the response thereto filed by respondent, and the "Supplemental and Amended Joint Consent Petition for Interim Suspension Pursuant to Louisiana Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.2,"

IT IS ORDERED that respondent, Robert B. Evans III, Louisiana Bar Roll number 23473, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.2, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Office of Disciplinary Counsel may seek the appointment of a trustee(s) to protect the interests of respondent's clients pursuant to the provisions of Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 27, if appropriate.
